entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Evoland 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.39 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

What were your childhood games like? Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references. From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you‚Äôll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored. ‚ÄúEvoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder‚Äù is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology. Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we‚Äôre proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices. ¬´ It‚Äôs a mashup on a grand scale ‚Äî and a successful one ‚Äî bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. ¬ª - 9/10 GamesBeat ‚ÄúEvoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.‚Äù 4/5 ‚Äì Hardcoregamer Compatible with MFI controllers. If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Evoland
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.59 [$0.59 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.59

Application Description

Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming. As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming ‚Äì all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games. - Play through the history of action-adventure video games - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship! - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com Follow us on Twitter @playdigious Like us on Facebook /playdigious If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using. Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Kingdom Eighties
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Kingdom Eighties is a standalone expansion to the award-winning Kingdom series: A singleplayer adventure of micro-strategy and base building, inspired by the neon lights of the eighties. You play as The Leader, a young camp counselor who will have to defend their town and family from the relentless attack of the mysterious Greed. What are these monsters, and why are they trying to steal their family legacy, the Crown of Creation? Recruit the neighborhood kids and assign them roles as soldiers or builders. Use coins to build and expand your kingdom, and fortify it by raising walls and defensive turrets. And be prepared for when the night comes, for the Greed will attack you without mercy. If you lose your crown, everything is doomed! Every game in the Kingdom series holds secrets. Explore the surroundings to unlock mounts, discover technology upgrades and weapons, and learn how to manage your resources wisely to survive. A KINGDOM GAME FOR VETERANS AND NEWCOMERS Building upon the well-known mechanics from the previous Kingdom games, Kingdom Eighties will deep dive into the lore and worldbuilding of the series. And if you're new to it, the story elements will fluently guide you through the gameplay mechanics. MEET YOUR COMPANIONS You will meet three supporting characters along the way: The Champ, The Tinkerer, and The Wiz. Each one has different abilities that you can combine to solve puzzles and find the solution to each level. HIT THE STREETS IN STYLE The summer camp is just the beginning! You will travel through different locations never seen before in the Kingdom series. Find some fresh wheels at the skateboard park, visit the shops on Main Street, and free the New Lands Mall from the Greed. PIXEL ART MEETS SYNTH Kingdom's iconic, handcrafted art style is back, now with a neon touch coming directly from the eighties aesthetics. Chill and vibe with the synthwave OST from Andreas Hald, and travel back to the wonder days of bike riding and summer camps, when everything seemed possible.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Kingdom Two Crowns
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$2.99 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • Norse LandsÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]
  • Call of OlympusÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $3.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • Norse LandsÔºö$1.99
  • Call of OlympusÔºö$2.99

Application Description

A shroud of mystery envelops these uncharted medieval lands where ancient monuments, relics and mythical creatures await. Echoes of bygone eras speak of past greatness and in Kingdom Two Crowns, part of the award-winning franchise Kingdom, you embark on an adventure as the Monarch. In this side-scrolling journey atop your steed, you recruit loyal subjects, build your Kingdom and protect your crown from the Greed, monstrous creatures looking to steal your Kingdom's treasures. BUILD Lay the foundation of a mighty Kingdom with towering walls, protecting towers while cultivating prosperity through building farms and recruiting villagers. In Kingdom Two Crowns expanding and growing your Kingdom grants access to new units and technologies. EXPLORE Venture into the unknown beyond the protection of your borders, through secluded forests and ancient ruins to seek treasures and hidden knowledge to aid your quest. Who knows what legendary artifacts or mythological beings you will find. DEFEND As the night falls, shadows come to life and the monstrous Greed assault your kingdom. Rally your troops, muster your courage, and steel yourself, for each night will demand ever-growing feats of tactical mastermind. Deploy archers, knights, siege weapons, and even newfound Monarch abilities and artifacts to hold against the waves of Greed. CONQUER As the Monarch, lead assaults against the source of the Greed to secure your islands. Send your groups of soldiers to clash with the enemy. A word of caution: make sure your troops are prepared and sufficient in numbers, as the Greed will not go down without a fight. UNCHARTED ISLES Kingdom Two Crowns is an evolving experience that includes several free content updates: ‚Ä¢ Shogun: Journey to lands inspired by the architecture and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in thick bamboo forests. ‚Ä¢ Dead Lands: Enter the dark lands of Kingdom. Play as unique Monarchs, including the Shardbinder Miriam, with powerful traits from the gothic horror action-RPG Bloodstained. ‚Ä¢ Challenge Islands: Representing the greatest challenge ever seen for hardened veteran monarchs. Take on five challenges with different rules and objectives. Can you survive long enough to claim the gold crown? Additional DLC available via in-app purchase: ‚Ä¢ Norse Lands: Set in a domain inspired by Norse Viking culture 1000 C.E, the Norse Lands DLC is a full new campaign that expands the world of Kingdom Two Crowns with a unique setting to build, defend, explore, and conquer. ‚Ä¢ Call of Olympus: Explore islands of ancient legends and mythos, seek the favors of the gods to challenge and defend against Greed of epic scales in this major expansion. Your adventure is only the beginning. Oh Monarch, stay vigilant for dark nights are still to come, protect your crown!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Dungeon and Puzzles
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

-- Awards: ‚óè 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection ‚óè Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual ‚óè Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award About: Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves. There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms. To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move. Features: ‚óè Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban ‚óè 150 handcrafted rooms ‚óè Fantasy themed pixel art ‚óè Non-linear dungeon map -- ‚óè Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/nekolyst ‚óè Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ‚óè Join our Discord server https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: This Is the Police
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you‚Äôll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg‚Äôs crime bosses. Sometimes you‚Äôll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg? - Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That‚Äôs up to you! - Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game ‚Äì and the fate of Jack Boyd. - The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them. - Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more. - Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg. - Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price. Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$1.99
  • Game modesÔºö$2.99
  • DestructiveÔºö$0.99
  • All archetypesÔºö$4.99
  • Chests in the seaÔºö$0.99
  • ShamanismÔºö$0.99
  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: Planit Pro: Photo Planner
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • 3D Model (A Year)Ôºö$5.99
  • 3D Model (A Month)Ôºö$0.99
  • Location Explorer (Month)Ôºö$4.99
  • Location Explorer (A Year)Ôºö$29.99

Application Description

Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app. This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more. Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos. Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way. In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro. Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections. License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:

In-App Purchases

  • Ultimate PackÔºö$14.99
  • Season 1 PackÔºö$9.99
  • Beyond the BunkersÔºö$6.99

  • Season 1 Pack (discount)Ôºö$6.99

  • Shadows of the PastÔºö$6.99

Application Description

Can you rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and ‚Äòmini 4X‚Äô. Decades after the Necroa Virus ravaged humanity, a few survivors emerge. Build a settlement, explore, scavenge resources and expand as you shape your post-apocalyptic society. The world is green and beautiful but danger lurks in the ruins! After Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‚ÄòPlague Inc.‚Äô - one of the most popular games ever with over 190 million players. Brilliantly executed with beautiful graphics and critically acclaimed gameplay - After Inc. is engaging and easy to learn. Build multiple settlements and gain abilities in a persistent campaign to lead humanity out of the darkness. Public Service Announcement: Unlike our other games, I‚Äôm pleased to say that After Inc. is not based on any real world situation. No need to start worrying about a real life zombie apocalypse yet‚Ä¶ ‚óà‚óà‚óà What happens after Plague Inc.? ‚óà‚óà‚óà Features: ‚óè Make difficult decisions - Are children an unaffordable luxury? Are dogs pets or a food source? Democracy or Authoritarianism? ‚óè Explore a beautiful post-apocalyptic United Kingdom ‚óè Exploit the ruins of the past to scavenge / harvest resources ‚óè Expand your Settlement with housing, farms, lumberyards and much more ‚óè Exterminate zombie infestations and defend humanity ‚óè Uncover old technologies and research new ones ‚óè Shape your society and provide services to keep your people happy ‚óè Build multiple settlements in a persistent campaign and level up abilities ‚óè Ultra realistic modelling of Zombie behaviour based on real life studies‚Ä¶ :P ‚óè Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions ‚óè 5 unique leaders with radically different abilities ‚óè Internet connectivity not required ‚óè No ‚Äòconsumable microtransactions. Expansion Packs are ‚Äòbuy once, play forever‚Äô ‚óèWill be updated for years to come. Special sale price to celebrate the launch of the game! ‚óà‚óà‚óà I‚Äôve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see. James (the designer) Contact me here: www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Only You Are Here ‚Äî an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.29 [$0.39 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.29

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hear My Baby Heartbeat App 2.0
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Trusted by over 500,000 families. The original, best-in-class baby heartbeat app to hear baby heartbeat at home with your iPhone. Looking for a fetal doppler alternative? Hear My Baby uses your iPhone microphone to help you listen to fetal heartbeat sounds ‚Äî not a doppler or a medical device. HMB 2.0 adds AI chat support, tailored tutorials, and pregnancy reveal videos (+ your heartbeat) to help you get results faster. Why parents choose Hear My Baby Heartbeat App 2.0 - Hear your baby‚Äôs heartbeat using the iPhone‚Äôs built-in microphone ‚Äî no accessories required - AI chat support gives step-by-step tips in real time to help you get a result faster - Tailored tutorial adapts to your stage of pregnancy and setup - Create baby sex reveal videos (+ your heartbeat) to share the moment - Record & save heartbeat clips; build a personal timeline you can revisit - Share easily with family and friends (Instagram, WhatsApp, email) - Designed by parents with expertise in sound engineering, AI and app development; warm, honest guidance throughout - Privacy first ‚Äî you control what‚Äôs saved and shared Real 5 Star Reviews "I never leave reviews, let along pay for apps but let‚Äôs just say I tried this , and it def works took me a minute to find babies heartbeat but I found her . And to think I almost spent 40 dollars on a monitor today !" - Lov3r_Gurl IG (USA Sept 2025) ‚ÄúI always find the heartbeat eventually and the rhythm is clear and strong. I love that I can record them to keep.‚Äù - T Lucker (Australia 2025) "I downloaded this very skeptical... It took me about 45 minutes of laying down, very still, with noise canceling headphones on, but I HEARD HIS HEARTBEAT. I am almost 18 weeks pregnant. From one momma to the next, it‚Äôs worth it." - Baby'sHeartbeat (2025) ‚ÄúIt took some time and patience... thank you for creating this cheap, awesome technology to use at home.‚Äù ‚Äî Niki ‚ÄúI was skeptical at first. Great app! Worth it.‚Äù ‚Äî Legretta Hear My Baby uses your iPhone‚Äôs microphone to listen for abdominal sounds; it‚Äôs not a doppler and doesn‚Äôt emit ultrasound. It‚Äôs a lifestyle keepsake for bonding and sharing, not a medical device and not for diagnosis. Results vary with weeks and baby position (many families hear best from 16+ weeks, clearest around ~27 weeks). If you‚Äôre worried at any time in pregnancy, please contact your clinician. For peace of mind, you can use Airplane Mode. How it works (quick start) 1. Find a very quiet room and remove your phone case 2. Place the iPhone microphone on your lower belly and move slowly 3. Our advanced audio engine isolates and amplifies fetal heartbeat sounds so you can listen and save the recording, and trim it to the appropriate moment for sharing quickly and easily. 4. Best from around 16+ weeks; clearest for many families at ~27 weeks. Results vary with baby‚Äôs position and placenta location. Tips for best results - Be still, breathe lightly, and try several positions around your bump - Press the mic firmly against the skin; explore low and to the sides - Bluetooth/over-ear headphones can make subtle sounds easier to hear Important Hear My Baby Heartbeat App is not a medical device and doesn‚Äôt replace prenatal care. If you‚Äôre concerned about anything in your pregnancy, please consult your clinician. Works on iPhone (not iPad). For extra peace of mind, you can switch to Airplane Mode while using the app. Privacy Your moments are yours. You decide what to keep or delete ‚Äî and who gets to hear them.¬† A word from our team... We never see your recordings, but LOVE to hear them so please tag us on Instagram.com/hearmybaby or TikTok.com/hearmybaby or Facebook.com/hearmybaby

entry.title: Goblin Tools
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

This is an app version of the free website goblin.tools, a collection of small, simple, single-task tools, mostly designed to help neurodivergent people with tasks they find overwhelming or difficult. Tools include - A Magic Todo list that automatically breaks down tasks into steps - The Formalizer that transforms your language to be more formal, sociable, concise, or many other options - The Judge that helps with interpreting tone - The Estimator that can guess at a timeframe for an activity - The Compiler to take entire braindumps and turn them into actionable tasks - The Chef, who turns a description of what ingredients and tools you have in your kitchen into a real recipe And many more to come! The website is free and publicly available. Purchases of this app go first towards keeping the site free and ad-free, before supporting the author.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Chests in the seaÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$1.99
  • Game modesÔºö$2.99
  • All archetypesÔºö$4.99
  • Chests in the seaÔºö$0.99
  • DestructiveÔºö$0.99
  • ShamanismÔºö$0.99
  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.99

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!
